creditline: Gift of Arthur and Lucille Weiss
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Human figure, stone, Mexican (Mezcala Valley) IV BC-IV AD mounted on plexi base with 77.56.12; cat. card dims H 5-3/4'. Carved by shallow grooves for face, mouth, neck and legs; mottled black-green highly lustrous metadiorite.
title: Figure
